attributes.action: Abolish the £20 note and print more £5 notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sure I speak for most small/medium convenience stores when I say this. I work in a shop and all I get is constant consecutive £20 notes from customers buying small purchases (small being £1/£2 or less!) and they have no idea how frustating it is for us constantly running out of change. We are not banks. I call on the Government to take the £20 note out of circulation and print more £5 notes which seem to be a rare sight nowadays
